docs.text: DVC example - digit recognizer Use the example in Recognizing hand-written digits to demonstrate how to apply DVC to existing projects. Getting Started Prerequisites Python pipx Set up environment Install pipenv and invoke through pipx pipx install pipenv invoke Install dependencies through invoke invoke init-dev Read tasks.py if you want to know that's done under the hook Authors Wei Lee weilee.rx@gmail.com
